refnamediv.refpurpose: convert RGB pixel format image to Utah Raster Toolkit run-length encoded

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: pix-rle decodes a pix5 format file, converts it into a Utah Raster Toolkit Run-Length Encoded (RLE) format file format, and writes it to standard out. If file.pix is not specified, standard input is read. -w and -n options specify the output width and height respectively; these can be set to the same value by use of the -s option.

listitem.para: This option permits the user to specify a background color as slash-separated decimal numbers in the range of 0 to 255, one each for the red, green, and blue channels.
Name of file to decode, in pix format.
Optional name of file to store RLE image in.
